questions.q: Is the mug and batter microwaved on high power for 60 seconds and check if the cake is done by inserting and toothpick into the center of the cake and then removing it, if wet batter clings to the toothpick is it microwaved for an additional 5 seconds, if the toothpick comes out clean contiue?

questions.q: Is the mug inverted to release the cake onto a plate?
followup: Has the mug and batter microwaved on high power for 60 seconds and check if the cake is done by inserting and toothpick into the center of the cake and then removing it, if wet batter clings to the toothpick is it microwaved for an additional 5 seconds, if the toothpick comes out clean contiue?

questions.q: Is the pan removed briefly from the heat to reduce spitting?
followup: Have the tofu cubes been cooked for 5 to 6 minutes until lightly browned?

questions.q: Is the pan returned to low heat?
